slider.slider-title-principal: The Dominican American Coalition of Connecticut

about_us.title: What does The Dominican American Coalition of Connecticut do?
about_us.paragraph: Through the execution of human development programs, The Dominican American Coalition of Connecticut works for the benefit of the inhabitants of the State of Connecticut by applying models of social intervention that seek the transformation of people, applying the “Value-Art” method.

strategies.alt: equipo de trabajo en una oficina conformando una estrategia social
strategies.title: Strategies
strategies.paragraph1: Future generations of Latinos can identify their heritage through culture and gain a historical perspective and understanding of their cultural identity.
